attributes.action: Implement article 50 of the Lisbon treaty immediately
attributes.additional_details:
On 23rd June the United Kingdom voted to Leave the EU administration, EU member states are now calling for the immediate implementation of article 50 of The Lisbon Treaty.

His right honourable PM David Cameron has publicly stated that he wishes that this decision will be left to the following PM, this leaves the United Kingdom in a precarious position until October which we the people find is wholly unacceptable.

The people say 'Let us start repairing UK immediately & not sit on our hands.
attributes.background: On 23rd June the United Kingdom voted to Leave the EU administration, EU member states are now calling for the immediate implementation of article 50 of The Lisbon Treaty.
